title: PK63 Coffee Table
body: The Danish Designer Poul Kjærholm created several beautiful design classics one of them were the PK63 Coffee Table. First Launched in 1961, the PK63 Coffee Table was first crafted to accompany his PK31 Sofa. With its outstanding simplicity it will definitely work well with well-streamlined, contemporary sofa today. Its unique air of elegance and clean lines brings a relaxed and timeless look to the table. It also works as a welcome addition to a mudroom or casual living area.
